content: this legal case involves a coownership property where the court has dissolved the coownership community and ordered payments to the parties involved the proposers are required to pay specific amounts to the counter parties some parties have already made partial payments the court has also mentioned a case delay and the application of default interest the decision is based on the property act and the court has appointed a temporary representative for the counter parties the temporary representative agreed with the proposers proposal to dissolve the coownership community the court determined the value of the property and ordered payments based on coownership shares since a physical division of the property was not possible the court ordered the termination of coownership and payment to the counter parties
